name: HANDMADE MESSENGER BAG - SKULL AND ROSES
description:
This messenger bag is handmade by me from excellent quality black waterproof cotton canvas and 100% cotton fabric. The front of the bag shows a series of skulls and roses. 
The bag is fully lined in red satin and has a large functional pocket . A silver magnetic closer completes the bag. 
This messenger bag has a black webbing strap attached to the bag by two silver brackets plus a silver glider so that you can adjust the strap to a length that suits you . The webbing has a maximum length of approx. 50 inches. 

All my bags have been sewn with medium weight interfacing which helps the bag keep its shape. 

The bag measures approx. 
Height 12 inches 
Width 10 inches 
Depth 3 inches.

name: HANDMADE MESSENGER BAG - OWLS ON BLUE
description:
This messenger bag is handmade by me from excellent quality black waterproof cotton canvas and 100% cotton fabric. The front of the bag shows a series Owls. 
The bag is fully lined in peacock blue satin and has a large functional pocket . 
A silver magnetic closer completes the bag. 
This messenger bag has a black webbing strap attached to the bag by means of two silver brackets plus a silver glider so that you can adjust the strap to a length that suits you . The webbing has a maximum length of approx. 50 inches. 

All my bags have been sewn with medium weight interfacing which helps the bag keep its shape. 

The bag measures approx. 10 inches by 11 inches with an approx. 3 inch gusset. 

POSTAGE 

UK - via royal mail first class

Europe - Airmail 
USA - Airmail
